name: starhackit-eks-lbc
description: deploying starhackit on AWS EKS with the Load Balancer Controller

scripts.graph-live: gc list --graph -a --default-exclude --types-exclude KeyPair --types-exclude Certificate --types-exclude Route53Domain --types-exclude NetworkInterface
scripts.e2e: gc d -f && gc d && gc l && gc a -f && gc a && gc d -f && gc d && gc l -o
